alert.note: Alert for Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 31 at 9:23AM EDT until August 31 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Newport/Morehead City NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Little Rockfish Creek near Little Rockfish Creek at Wallace affecting Duplin County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little Rockfish Creek Little Rockfish Creek at Wallace. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Water overflows the creek`s banks and inundates adjacent low lying residential property. Floodwaters may also threaten portions of the Wallace Wastewater Treatment Plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EDT Thursday was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The creek will likely crest within the next couple of hours and then slowly fall. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 200 PM EDT.
